# UITextLayoutDirection.down

**Case**

Layout of the text in a downward direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case down
```

## Constants

- **UITextLayoutDirection.right**: Layout of the text to the right.
- **UITextLayoutDirection.left**: Layout of the text to the left.
- **UITextLayoutDirection.up**: Layout of the text in an upward direction.
